definition: lit. pulling on the lapels exposes the elbows (idiom)/strapped for cash/unable to make ends meet
(lit.) to hold sb by the elbow/(fig.) to hold back/to impede/to handicap
lit. armpit/elbow and armpit/fig. right up close (to a disaster)/in one's backyard/on one's doorstep
the elbow turns the wrong way/to favor an outsider instead of someone on one's own side (idiom)
pinyin: ge1 bo5 zhou3 chao2 wai4 guai3

definition: lit. calamity in one's armpit (idiom); a major coup happening on one's doorstep/trouble or danger in one's own backyard
Dongpo pork shoulder, traditional dish said to have been created by Northern Song dynasty writer Su Dongpo 蘇東坡|苏东坡

sentences.english: Mist nudged up against the windows and doors of the house.
sentences.chinese: 薄雾遭遇房屋的窗口和门而用肘轻推。

sentences.english: She just blames it all on system.
The Qi of meridian infuses into the shallow depression of the elbow like water flowing into a marsh.
sentences.chinese: 经气流注至此，入曲肘浅凹处，犹如水进沼泽。

sentences.english: Two different views show the completed oil pump inlet elbow.
sentences.chinese: 两种不同的意见显示完成油泵入口肘。

sentences.english: His elbow was poking through his torn shirt sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 他的肘伸出了撕破的衬衣袖管。

sentences.english: The president was hobbled by congressional resistance.
sentences.chinese: 总统因国会的抵制而受挚肘。

sentences.english: I give Louis a nudge, and we go down together.
sentences.chinese: 我用肘轻推一下路易斯，我们一起下楼来。

sentences.english: Bowing its elbow, the owl sows in the bowl.
sentences.chinese: 猫头鹰弯着肘在碗中播种。

sentences.english: Cubitus varus is the most difficult question in the treatment of humeral supracondylar fracture in children.
sentences.chinese: 上骨折治疗最难点是极易发生肘内翻畸形。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, cubitus varus is the most common complication of the supracondylar fracture of humerus.
sentences.chinese: 肘内翻畸形是小儿肱骨髁上骨折常见的并发症。

sentences.english: Jack was wounded in the legs. He levered himself up on his elbow and shouted for help.
sentences.chinese: 杰克双腿受了伤，他用肘费劲地支起身子大声呼救。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the mechanism of ulnar nerve anterior submuscular transposition in the treatment of cubit tunnel syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的为肘管综合征的治疗提供术式设计的解剖学依据。

sentences.english: Put your elbows on the desk. Bend over.
sentences.chinese: 将你的肘放在桌上，弯下腰。

sentences.english: Before the length of an hundred cubits was the north door, and the breadth was fifty cubits.
sentences.chinese: 这圣屋长一百肘，宽五十肘，有向北的门。

sentences.english: Before the length of an hundred cubits was the north door, and the breadth was fifty cubits.
sentences.chinese: 这圣屋长一百肘，宽五十肘，有向北的门。

sentences.english: Objective To study desired operation method of treatment cubitus varus deformity in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究治疗儿童肘内翻畸形的手术方法。

definition: to sway one's hips/to twist one's waist
